title: Font Recognition Using Deep Learning
description: A deep learning model built with LeNet-5 architecture to recognize and classify different fonts from images using convolutional neural networks.
features: Accurate font classification from image inputs
Improved OCR support for diverse font types
Trained on a large dataset with varied fonts

title: Book Store
description: A full-stack Book Store application with role-based access control, real-time inventory management, and admin analytics, built using the MERN stack and Firebase.
features: Role-based access for Users and Admins
Firebase Authentication with Email/Password and Google Sign-in
Admin Dashboard for orders, revenue, and user insights
Secure, protected routes for admin-level operations

title: Blog App
description: A MERN stack Blog platform featuring role-based access control, admin blog management, and secure user interactions including authentication and commenting.
features: Admin can create, edit, and delete blogs
Users can read blogs and comment
Protected admin routes with secure access

title: Breast Cancer Prediction
description: An SVM-based machine learning model that classifies breast tumors as benign or malignant using optimized features and evaluation metrics.
features: Evaluation with Confusion Matrix and Classification Report
